flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: It uses differentnkinds of cries forncommunicating withfothers of its kindnand for pursuingnits prey.
To corner prey,nthey check eachnother's locationfusing barks thatnonly they cannunderstand.
Around dawn, itsnominous howlnechoes through thefarea to announcenthat this is itsnterritory.
HOUNDOUR hunt as a coordinated pack.nThey communicate with each other usingna variety of cries to corner their prey.fThis POKéMON’s remarkable teamwork isnunparalleled.
HOUNDOUR hunt as a coordinated pack.nThey communicate with each other usingna variety of cries to corner their prey.fThis POKéMON’s remarkable teamwork isnunparalleled.
HOUNDOUR communicate with each othernusing a variety of cries to corner theirnprey. This POKéMON’s remarkable teamworknis simply unparalleled.
To corner prey, they check each other’snlocation using barks that only they cannunderstand.
It uses different kinds of cries forncommunicating with others of its kind andnfor pursuing prey.
It conveys its feelings usingndifferent cries. It works in a packnto cleverly take down prey.
It conveys its feelings usingndifferent cries. It works in a packnto cleverly take down prey.
It is smart enough to hunt innpacks. It uses a variety of criesnfor communicating with others.
It uses different kinds of cries forncommunicating with others of itsnkind and for pursuing its prey.
To corner prey, they check eachnother’s location using barks thatnonly they can understand.
Il est assez évolué pour chassernen meute et communiquer parndes séries de cris modulés.
It is smart enough to hunt innpacks. It uses a variety of criesnfor communicating with others.
Il est assez évolué pour chassernen meute et communiquer parndes séries de cris modulés.
It is smart enough to hunt innpacks. It uses a variety of criesnfor communicating with others.
It is smart enough to hunt innpacks. It uses a variety of criesnfor communicating with others.
It is smart enough to hunt innpacks. It uses a variety of criesnfor communicating with others.
よあけごろ　あたりいったいにnひびきわたる　ぶきみな　とおぼえでnじぶんたちの　なわばりを　アピール。
새벽녘에 주변 일대에n울려 퍼지는 기분 나쁜 울음소리로n자신들의 영역을 어필한다.
Il hurle dès l’aube pour délimiter son territoire.nOn l’entend à des kilomètres à la ronde.
Im Morgengrauen schallt sein ominöses Geheulenüber das Gebiet, das es für sich beansprucht.
Al amanecer, resuena por la zona su inquietantenaullido para anunciar que es su territorio.
All’alba, i suoi sinistri urli riecheggiano nell’aria.nIn questo modo demarca il territorio.
Around dawn, its ominous howl echoes throughnthe area to announce that this is its territory.
夜明けごろ　あたり一帯にn響きわたる　不気味な　遠ぼえでn自分たちの　縄張りを　アピール。
なかまだけで　わかりあえるnなきごえで　おたがいの　いちをnたしかめながら　えものをおいつめる。
동료끼리만 서로 알 수 있는n울음소리로 서로의 위치를n확인해가며 먹이를 몰아붙인다.
Pour traquer leur proie, ils se localisent mutuellementnavec des aboiements compris par eux seuls.
Sie treiben ihre Beute in die Enge und orientieren sichndabei anhand ihres Bellens, das nur sie verstehen.
Para arrinconar a sus presas, comprueban susnposiciones con ladridos que solo ellos entienden.
Per circondare la preda, gli Houndour si comunicanonla posizione reciproca con ululati che capiscono solonloro.
To corner prey, they check each other’s locationnusing barks that only they can understand.
仲間だけで　わかりあえるn鳴き声で　お互いの　位置をn確かめながら　獲物を　追いつめる。
さまざまな　なきごえを　つかいわけ　なかまとnれんらくを　とりあい　えものを　おいこんでいく。nチームワークの　みごとさは　ポケモンずいいち。
여러 가지 울음소리를 사용하여 동료와n연락을 주고받아 먹이를 몰아간다.n팀워크는 포켓몬 중 제일이다.
Les Malosse chassent en meute organisée. Ils communiquentnentre eux grâce à une série de petits cris pour encercler leurnproie. L’étonnant travail d’équipe de ces Pokémon est sansncomparaison.
Hunduster jagen in Gruppen. Sie kommunizieren miteinandernüber verschiedene Arten von Geheul und treiben ihre Feinde inndie Enge. Die Zusammenarbeit dieser Pokémon ist einzigartig.

Houndour sale a cazar con el resto de la manada con totalncoordinación. Estos Pokémon se comunican unos con otrosnusando una serie de aullidos para acorralar a su presa.nEl compañerismo que existe entre ellos es incomparable.
Gli Houndour cacciano in squadre organizzate. Comunicanontra loro con svariati versi per intrappolare la preda.nQuest’incredibile lavoro di squadra è unico nel suo genere.
Houndour hunt as a coordinated pack. They communicate withneach other using a variety of cries to corner their prey.nThis Pokémon’s remarkable teamwork is unparalleled.
様々な　鳴き声を　使いわけ　仲間とn連絡を　取りあい　獲物を　追い込んでいく。nチームワークの　見事さは　ポケモン随一。
さまざまな　なきごえを　つかいわけ　なかまとnれんらくを　とりあい　えものを　おいこんでいく。nチームワークの　みごとさは　ポケモンずいいち。
여러 가지 울음소리를 사용하여 동료와n연락을 주고받아 먹이를 몰아간다.n팀워크는 포켓몬 중 제일이다.
Les Malosse chassent en meute organisée. Ils communiquentnentre eux grâce à une série de petits cris pour encercler leurnproie. L’étonnant travail d’équipe de ces Pokémon est sansncomparaison.
Hunduster jagen in Gruppen. Sie kommunizieren miteinandernüber verschiedene Arten von Geheul und treiben ihre Feinde inndie Enge. Die Zusammenarbeit dieser Pokémon ist einzigartig.

Houndour sale a cazar con el resto de la manada con totalncoordinación. Estos Pokémon se comunican unos con otrosnusando una serie de aullidos para acorralar a su presa.nEl compañerismo que existe entre ellos es incomparable.
Gli Houndour cacciano in squadre organizzate. Comunicanontra loro con svariati versi per intrappolare la preda.nQuest’incredibile lavoro di squadra è unico nel suo genere.
Houndour hunt as a coordinated pack. They communicatenwith each other using a variety of cries to corner their prey.nThis Pokémon’s remarkable teamwork is unparalleled.
様々な　鳴き声を　使いわけ　仲間とn連絡を　取りあい　獲物を　追い込んでいく。nチームワークの　見事さは　ポケモン随一。
なかまとの　れんけいが　とくい。nパートナーに　なると　トレーナーのnめいれいに　とっても　ちゅうじつだ。
동료와의 연계가 특기다.n파트너가되면 트레이너의n명령에 매우 충실하다.
擅長與夥伴合作。n只要與訓練家成為搭檔，n就會徹底服從訓練家的命令。
Ce Pokémon est doué pour le travail en équipe.nC’est un compagnon fidèle qui écoute les ordresnde son Dresseur sans sourciller.
Es ist auf Zusammenarbeit spezialisiert undnfolgt den Befehlen seines Trainers aufs Wort.
Famoso por su lealtad y ánimo cooperativo.nObedecerá sin dudar todo cuanto le ordenensu Entrenador.
Agisce sempre in squadra con i suoi simili.nÈ un compagno fedele e segue attentamentenle istruzioni del suo Allenatore.
It cooperates with others skillfully. When itnbecomes your partner, it’s very loyal to you asnits Trainer and will obey your orders.
仲間との　連携が　得意。nパートナーに　なると　トレーナーのn命令に　とっても　忠実だ。
擅长与伙伴的合作。n如果成为同伴，n就会非常听从训练家的命令。
よあけまえに　ぶきみな　とおぼえをnくりかえし　じぶんたちの　むれのnそんざいを　アピール　している。
동이 트기 전에 기분 나쁜 울음을n반복하여 자신들 무리의n존재를 어필한다.
會在天亮前反覆發出令人n不寒而慄的長嚎，藉此強調n自己群體的存在。
Si ses congénères et lui poussent de sinistresnhurlements avant l’aube, c’est pour signalernleur présence à tout le monde.
Mit wiederholtem unheimlichen Heulen vornTagesanbruch machen sie auf die Existenznihres Rudels aufmerksam.
Los escalofriantes aullidos que profiere justonantes del alba son para señalar la presencia densu manada.
Gli urli sinistri che emette prima dell’alba hannonla funzione di segnalare la presenza del suonbranco.
They make repeated eerie howls before dawnnto call attention to their pack.
夜明け前に　不気味な　遠吠えをn繰り返し　自分たちの　群れのn存在を　アピール　している。
会在天亮之前反复发出恐怖的长嚎，n并以此来彰显自己群体的存在。
